snippet: Pittsburgh Penguins defenseman Kris Letang resumed practicing nearly two months after he had a stroke, but his return to game action remained uncertain.
abstract: Pittsburgh Penguins defenseman Kris Letang resumes practicing nearly two months after he had a stroke, but his return to game action remains uncertain; other hockey news noted.
lead_paragraph: Pittsburgh Penguins defenseman Kris Letang resumed practicing nearly two months after he had a stroke, but his return to game action remained uncertain.
